descriptionModule.briefSummary: A single-center cohort of patients with acute ischemic stroke and transient ischemic attack who admitted to the Severance hospital of Yonsei university and their long-term outcomes.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription:
This is a single-center cohort of consecutive patients with acute ischemic stroke and transient ischemic attack who admitted to the Severance hospital of Yonsei university in Republic of Korea.

Stroke recurrence, Cardiovascular event, all cause mortality and cardiovascular mortality were collected through long-term follow up.

armGroups.label: Long-term follow up, observational
armGroups.description: This cohort does not involve interventions, just follow up of prognosis of ischemic stroke/transient ischemic attack patients.

primaryOutcomes.measure: Event of Stroke or transient ischemic attack
primaryOutcomes.description: The time of a stroke or transient ischemic attack occurs (through study completion)
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: through study completion, up to 10 years

primaryOutcomes.measure: Event of cardiovascular disease (include stroke/transient ischemic attack)
primaryOutcomes.description: The time of a cardiovascular disease (stroke/transient ischemic attack) occurs (through study completion)
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: through study completion, up to 10 years

primaryOutcomes.description: The time of death from any cause (through study completion)
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: through study completion, up to 10 years

primaryOutcomes.measure: Cardiovascular cause mortality (include stroke/transient ischemic attack mortality)
primaryOutcomes.description: The time of death from cardiovascular cause (through study completion)
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: through study completion, up to 10 years

primaryOutcomes.description: Measure functional outcome as the form of mRS at 3 months

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All patients with acute ischemic stroke or transient ischemic attack

Exclusion Criteria:

* A patient who did not agree with enrollment of this study
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: All patients with acute ischemic stroke/transient ischemic attack
